title: BNP Paribas – The Bank That Does it Better

France’s largest listed bank beat analysts’ expectations in the third quarter. Former Swiss National Bank President Philipp Hildebrand sees BNP as a role model. Also for Credit Suisse. BNP Paribas has been building its relationships with businesses across Europe in recent years, which is now starting to pay off, a look at Thursday’s quarterly results shows. France’s […]
